author: euclides kil√¥ ardila
title: Tema espiritual del d√≠a: ¬°La man√≠a de quejarse ‚Äòpor todo y a toda hora‚Äô | Vanguardia.com
text: Pasar todo el d√≠a quej√°ndose porque le pasa ‚Äòesto‚Äô o ‚Äòaquello‚Äô, en lugar de aclararle el panorama, termina rob√°ndole la energ√≠a que necesita para solucionar de manera precisa eso que lo est√° atormentando. Aunque usted cree que al quejarse se ‚Äòdesahoga‚Äô o puede ‚Äòmitigar la frustraci√≥n‚Äô que le genera ese momento por el que atraviesa, al final solo multiplica sus tensiones y se complica m√°s la existencia. Y eso ocurre porque usted permanece centrado en lo negativo y, sin siquiera notarlo, se contagia del ‚Äòs√≠ndrome‚Äô del descontento. Es un asunto de ‚Äòl√≥gica‚Äô: su queja diaria nutre su decepci√≥n y su rabia, lo que le genera m√°s sufrimiento y se amarga todo el d√≠a por ese acontecimiento. Es un c√≠rculo vicioso: usted se queja y eso refuerza patrones negativos que, tal vez sin darse cuenta, interfieren con la resoluci√≥n de ese problema. Eso deteriora su cotidianidad y su actividad social. Las salidas a la delicada situaci√≥n que vive no se encuentran abriendo la puerta de la ‚Äòquejadera‚Äô; ellas surgen cuando usted decide enfrentarlas con decoro. No tiene caso ‚Äògritar a todos los vientos‚Äô lo que le pasa. Y el quid de este asunto no es negar que pasa por una situaci√≥n dif√≠cil, de lo que se trata es de expresar lo que no le hace sentir bien, pero sin convertirse en el ‚Äòquejumbroso‚Äô del grupo. Dicho de otra manera: busque un espacio para expresar de forma adecuada lo que siente, pero sin que eso que habla se convierta en un argumento cotidiano; es decir, sin que sea una queja continua. M√°s all√° de la adversidad por la que pase, no puede permitir que el desconsuelo se convierta en un h√°bito. Si acepta y reconoce que cada situaci√≥n dif√≠cil por la que pase es una oportunidad que le da la vida para reaccionar de manera propositiva ante algo, podr√° ‚Äòdesenredar la pita‚Äô. ¬°D√©jese guiar por la intuici√≥n! En ese momento de aflicci√≥n, piense en la forma correcta de solucionar el problema. Todo en esta vida tiene su perspectiva. Incluso es una sana terapia elevar una plegaria sincera al cielo, pidiendo fuerza y gu√≠a. Aunque parezca que la esperanza se desvanece, Dios le dar√° una mano. Cuando se enfrente a ese remolino de la vida, mantenga su fe inquebrantable. Cada preocupaci√≥n es una prueba que lo fortalece, si decide enfrentarla con entereza. Superar la adversidad implica que haga acopio de √°nimo y que deba ‚Äòembadurnarse‚Äô de esperanza. Conf√≠e en su poder interior y en la presencia amorosa de lo divino que le acompa√±a en todo momento. Vaya de la mano de Dios despejando el camino de obst√°culos. ¬°H√°game caso! EL CASO DE HOY Testimonio: ‚ÄúTengo muchas dudas sobre los pasos que debo dar para no equivocarme. Me la paso pensando todo el tiempo sobre lo que debo hacer en torno a una acci√≥n que le d√© un giro a mi vida, pero temo a lo desconocido. Pienso de manera recurrente en eso y no vivo tranquilo. No s√© qu√© hacer. Deme un consejo. Mil gracias‚Äù. Escuche: Vitam√≠nicos espirituales de Vanguardia Respuesta: Comprendo que la resistencia a lo ‚Äúdesconocido‚Äù pueda generarle ansiedad. Sin embargo, debe estar abierto a nuevas perspectivas. Tal vez sus pensamientos lo est√°n atando y sus miedos lo tienen atiborrado. ¬°Sea consciente de ellos! Reconozca que todo sucede por una raz√≥n y que cada experiencia, por dif√≠cil que sea, le dejar√° ense√±anzas. D√©jeme decirle que los temores suelen ser producto de creencias limitantes que ha adquirido a lo largo de su vida: identifique y supere esas ataduras, so pena de quedar anquilosado. Conf√≠e en sus capacidades y en su intuici√≥n. Aprenda a fluir con los cambios y con las situaciones impredecibles de la vida. Es bueno pensar con detenimiento sobre los pasos que debe dar, pero no se quede solo en elucubraciones. ¬øQu√© le quiero decir? Que le dedique tiempo a la introspecci√≥n para conectarse con su ser interior y para descubrir su verdadero prop√≥sito en este mundo; pero no se quede dando vueltas sin sentido. Aprenda a confiar en el proceso y en su capacidad para enfrentar lo que venga. En ese orden de ideas, perm√≠tase aprender sobre cada situaci√≥n que viva, de tal forma que pueda evolucionar en el camino. ¬°P√≠dale a Dios una gota de claridad y de serenidad! BREVES REFLEXIONES Los cambios siempre vienen acompa√±ados de remezones; y ellos no son el fin del mundo, solo son el inicio de una nueva forma de ver la vida. Eso que usted llama ‚Äòcrisis‚Äô es un indicador de que ya no est√° a gusto con la forma en la que est√°n ciertas cosas que le rodean. En nuestro entorno nos encontramos con personas que nos realizan aportes positivos a nuestras vidas y con otras que, por el contrario, se transforman en sujetos t√≥xicos que debemos evitar. Hay gente que nos inspira y hay otra que nos agota. ¬°Escojamos con cuidado! Solamente somos administradores temporales de algunas cosas que Dios nos ha entregado para disfrutarlas de forma transitoria. Nada es nuestro, la vida nos la alquilan para que la disfrutemos mientras la tenemos. Periodista de Vanguardia desde 1989. Egresado de la Universidad Aut√≥noma de Bucaramanga y especialista en Gerencia de La Comunicaci√≥n Organizacional de la Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana. Miembro del equipo de √Årea Metropolitana y encargado de la p√°gina Espiritualidad. Ganador del Premio Nacional de Periodismo Sim√≥n Bol√≠var. @kiloardila eardila@vanguardia.com

author: @RevistaISTOE
title: Artur Jorge celebra ‚Äòvit√≥ria justa‚Äô contra o Corinthians, mas evita exalta√ß√£o no Botafogo
text:
02/06/2024 - 10:51
O Botafogo quebrou o tabu de jamais ter vencido na Neo Qu√≠mica Arena ao fazer 1 a 0 no Corinthians no s√°bado √† noite e est√° brigando pelo t√≠tulo do Brasileir√£o pela segunda temporada seguida. O t√©cnico Artur Jorge definiu a vit√≥ria como ‚Äúimportante e justa‚Äù, mas n√£o quer saber de empolga√ß√£o para evitar frustra√ß√£o semelhante com a da temporada passada, quando o time largou bem e perdeu f√¥lego e o t√≠tulo no fim.
Em enorme evolu√ß√£o sob o comando do treinador portugu√™s, o Botafogo subiu para os 13 pontos na tabela, somando seu quarto triunfo. Briga no topo da tabela e tamb√©m est√° classificado √†s oitavas de final da Copa Libertadores, o que deixa a torcida menos machucada com a perda do t√≠tulo de 2023, no qual abrir 14 pontos de frente e n√£o sustentou, terminando somente em quarto.
‚ÄúUma vit√≥ria importante para n√≥s, contra um rival dif√≠cil. Mas dentro do que projetamos, com equil√≠brio. Mas vamos controlar as expectativas. Espero que possamos continuar evoluindo e ganhando para elevar o Botafogo em patamares que nos coloquem nas decis√µes‚Äù, afirmou Artur Jorge, vendo espa√ßo para melhoras no time.
‚ÄúSe olharmos com justi√ßa para aquilo que foi no jogo, diremos que s√≥ poderia ser uma vit√≥ria do Botafogo. Por aquilo fez, criou e at√© desperdi√ßou de chances. Uma vit√≥ria que nos cabe muito bem por aquilo que fizemos‚Äù, celebrou o resultado.
Na temporada passada, o discurso no elenco e at√© da comiss√£o t√©cnica a cada resultado positivo no Brasileir√£o, era de euforia, de que era mais um passo para a conquista. Artur Jorge n√£o quer saber disso, apesar de n√£o esconder a satisfa√ß√£o com o grupo.
‚ÄúO que demonstraram hoje (s√°bado) mostrou o grande compromisso que eles t√™m com o Botafogo‚Äù, disse. ‚ÄúVamos dar o melhor em cada um dos jogos, sabemos que o nosso melhor √© vencer e precisamos de coragem para jogar como jogamos com o Corinthians.‚Äù

title: Jamia Masjid Sealed On Shab Barat: Auqaf
text:
Jamia Masjid Sealed On Shab Barat: Auqaf Srinagar- The authorities have disallowed the congregational night prayers at Srinagar‚Äôs historic grand mosque on Shab-e-Baraat, one of the holiest nights in the Islamic calendar. The police also put Mirwaiz Umar Farooq under house detention.
Anjuman Auqaf Jamia Masjid has expressed profound disappointment over this decision and strongly condemned these repressive measures. Anjuman Auqaf said that following Asr prayers, authorities abruptly closed the gates of Jama Masjid Srinagar, while police personnel asked worshippers to vacate the mosque premises.
The Auqaf was further informed that the observance of Shab-e-Baraat would not be permitted at the Jama Masjid.
Terming the ban a repressive measure, the Anjuman Auqaf said, ‚ÄúIt is deeply unfortunate that every time an important religious occasion arrives, people in large numbers who visit the Jama Masjid are left disappointed to find the grand mosque forcibly closed and Mirwaiz Umar Farooq barred from fulfilling his religious responsibilities. Such repeated restrictions not only hurt the sentiments of the people but also infringe upon their fundamental religious rights.‚Äù
Chief Minister Omar Abdullah called the restrictions at the grand mosque ‚Äúunfortunate‚Äù and said they indicate a ‚Äúlack of confidence in law and order machinery.‚Äù
‚ÄúIt is very unfortunate that the security establishment has taken the decision to seal the historic Jamia Masjid, Srinagar, on one of the holiest nights in the Islamic calendar ‚Äì Shab-e-Baraat. This decision betrays a lack in confidence in the people and a lack of confidence in the law and order machinery that calm won‚Äôt prevail without extreme measures. The people of Srinagar deserved better,‚Äù he posted on X.
Notably, this is the sixth consecutive year that police have not allowed Shab-e-Baraat prayers at the Jamia Masjid. The prayers have been stopped since 2019.
Chief Minister Omar Abdullah called the sealing of Jamia Masjid on Shabe Baraat unfortunate and lack of confidence in the law & order machinery.
‚ÄúIt is very unfortunate that the security establishment has taken the decision to seal the historic Jamia Masjid, Srinagar on one of the holiest nights in the Islamic calendar ‚Äì #shabebaraat. This decision betrays a lack in confidence in the people & a lack of confidence in the law & order machinery that calm won‚Äôt prevail without extreme measures. The people of Srinagar deserved better,‚Äù Chief Minister Omar Abdullah wrote on X.

author: @WDTV5News
title: 4-year-old and infant in Colorado found safe after endangered missing alert
text: 4-year-old and infant in Colorado found safe after endangered missing alert STERLING, Colo. ( [KKTV](https://www.kktv.com/2023/12/28/statewide-alert-issued-colorado-missing-4-year-old-infant/)/Gray News) - A statewide alert issued in Colorado on Thursday for two young children has been canceled, [KKTV reports.](https://www.kktv.com/2023/12/28/statewide-alert-issued-colorado-missing-4-year-old-infant/) The Colorado Bureau of Investigation issued an alert for 4-year-old Zuryah Thalacker and 23-month-old Ansom Thalacker. Officials say the two children were located and were safe as of 3 p.m. on Thursday. Officials say the children have been missing since Wednesday at 1:30 p.m. when they were last seen in the Sterling area. The alert stated that the children may have been with 28-year-old Justina Lambert. The CBI did not disclose the relationship between the three in the alert. The alert said the children were believed to be traveling in a 2007 White Nissan Murano with CA license plate 9ERA912, with the rear bumper missing. Copyright 2023 KKTV via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Erin
title: A New Building In Shanghai Inspired By A Forest Of Trees
text:
Photography by Eiichi Kano
Koichi Takada Architects has designed a retail building in Shanghai, China, that‚Äôs described as an ‚Äòarchitectural forest‚Äô of 32 trees.
Photography ZY Architectural Photography
Situated on a site that only four decades ago was densely forested, Solar Trees Marketplace is the first step in returning green to greater Shanghai and mitigating the effects of urban sprawl.
Photography by Eiichi Kano
From the outside, the tree-like building is a symbolic gateway to the expansive masterplan that prioritizes pedestrian activity, parkland, and nature in an increasingly urban environment.
Photography ZY Architectural Photography
Photography ZY Architectural Photography
The organic form of Solar Trees Marketplace is intended to merge with a promenade of native Camphor trees, and over time transform the area into an oasis of calm amid the bustling urban landscape.
Photography by Eiichi Kano
Inside, the building is operating as an immersive sales and display suite for the adjacent residential masterplan development, which has also been designed by Koichi Takada Architects.
Photography ZY Architectural Photography
Photography ZY Architectural Photography
Overhanging greenery has also been included in the design, complementing the nature-inspired building and highlighting the curves.

organizations.name: photography zy architectural photography photography zy architectural photography

author: AFP
title: New York finally ends record 700 plus days without snow - Insider Paper
text: [New York](https://insiderpaper.com/new-york-seeks-to-curb-buses-of-migrants-from-southern-border/) on Tuesday finally ended a record streak of more than 700 days without measurable snowfall, with a thin layer of white powder covering Central Park and other parts of America‚Äôs most populous city. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been 701 days since Central Park last recorded an inch of snow on a calendar day,‚Äù the National Weather Service announced on X, formerly Twitter. Since midnight, an inch (2.5 centimeters) had fallen at an official measuring point in Central Park, the NWS said, adding that a total of 1.4 inches of accumulation were logged since the storm began on Monday. ‚ÄúThe streak has ended!‚Äù it proclaimed. Other parts of the city like Brooklyn were clearing the white stuff from sidewalks after a long holiday weekend. In the northern suburbs, some schools were closed and public transport had slight delays. New York ‚Äî home to 8.5 million people ‚Äî hadn‚Äôt seen perceptible snow since early 2022. In other areas of New York state, like the Buffalo area, snowfall is a more regular and serious occurrence. At Christmas 2022, northern and western New York got more than four feet (one meter) of snow, and dozens of people died in the region. The frequency, intensity and unpredictability of snowfall in the United States, as in other parts of the world, has been affected by [climate change](https://insiderpaper.com/gaza-war-worsening-climate-change-threats-says-jordans-king/).

author: Patheresa Wells; Published December
title: Tay Tay Dance Party @ El Coraz√≥n - The Ticket
text: üìÜ Thursday, January 4th üéü $20 üìç El Coraz√≥n: 109 Eastlake Ave E, Seattle What Taylor Swift (and Beyonc√©) have done for the economy this last year with their tours might have kept us out of a recession. That‚Äôs a cheeky thing to say, but also the Taylor Swift Impact created an economic boost on 53 nights in 20 locations‚Äîa [ five-month, five-billion-dollar shift](https://www.ustravel.org/news/taylor-swift-impact-5-months-and-5-billion). Then there was the ‚Äú [Swift Quake](https://www.cnn.com/2023/07/27/entertainment/taylor-swift-seismic-activity/index.html),‚Äù where fans triggered an earthquake in Seattle. With that kind of momentum, consider starting 2024 with the touring Tay Tay Dance party at El Coraz√≥n in Seattle‚Äôs Cascade neighborhood. Join DJ Swiftie for a two-hour party ‚ÄúTaylor-made‚Äù for Swifties. Expect hits from every era‚ÄîLover, Fearless, Evermore, Reputation, Speak, Now, Red, Folklore, 1989, Midnights, and whatever else I‚Äôm forgetting. This all-ages event includes a laser show to accompany the setlist, which spans Swift‚Äôs almost 18-year career and ten studio albums. Whether a fan or hater, Swift is so damn honest you can‚Äôt help having at least a little admiration. Dance tip: Try Taylor‚Äôs signature dance move, [The Mom Croon](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdaEBbqL5V4&ab_channel=TaylorSwiftVietnamFC), which is about feeling IDGAF because the beat has you caught up. Let go and succumb to the lavender haze. üíå Be Our Pen Pal! Find out what‚Äôs happening in Seattle by [subscribing to our newsletter](https://theticket.seattletimes.com/newsletter/).

author: Admin
title: New Zealand Unveils Effortless Online Visa Process for Belgian, French, German, UK, and Argentina Citizens
text:
In a significant move to enhance accessibility and streamline the visa application process, New Zealand proudly introduces a user-friendly online visa system for citizens from Belgium, France, Germany, the United Kingdom, and Argentina. This innovative approach reflects New Zealand‚Äôs commitment to welcoming global visitors and fostering stronger ties with nations across the world.
NEW ZEALAND VISA FOR BELGIAN CITIZENS
Since the implementation of the online visa system, Belgian citizens can now apply for a New Zealand visa with unparalleled ease. The digital platform simplifies the application process, allowing Belgians to initiate their visa applications from the comfort of their homes. This user-friendly approach aligns with New Zealand‚Äôs commitment to providing a seamless experience for global travelers.
NEW ZEALAND VISA FOR FRENCH CITIZENS
French citizens seeking to explore the breathtaking landscapes and vibrant culture of New Zealand can now enjoy a streamlined visa application process. The online platform eliminates the complexities of traditional paper-based applications, offering a more convenient avenue for French travelers to obtain their New Zealand visas. This development aims to attract more French tourists, contributing to the growth of New Zealand‚Äôs thriving tourism sector.
NEW ZEALAND VISA FOR GERMAN CITIZENS
The introduction of the online visa application system brings enhanced accessibility for German citizens planning a visit to New Zealand. The user-friendly interface of the digital platform simplifies the application process, allowing Germans to submit their visa applications efficiently. With a commitment to fostering global collaborations, New Zealand welcomes German travelers to experience its diverse landscapes and rich cultural heritage.
NEW ZEALAND VISA FOR UK CITIZENS
United Kingdom residents can now benefit from a more convenient visa processing system when planning a trip to New Zealand. The online visa platform offers a hassle-free application process, allowing UK citizens to submit their applications electronically. This development aligns with New Zealand‚Äôs dedication to providing a seamless travel experience for individuals from the United Kingdom, further strengthening the bonds between the two nations.
NEW ZEALAND VISA FOR ARGENTINA CITIZENS
Citizens of Argentina now have a simplified visa application process to explore the wonders of New Zealand. The online platform facilitates a straightforward application process, enabling Argentinians to apply for their visas with ease. New Zealand extends a warm invitation to Argentine citizens, encouraging them to experience the beauty and hospitality the country has to offer.
The online visa application process involves a few simple steps for citizens of Belgium, France, Germany, the United Kingdom, and Argentina. Travelers can visit the official New Zealand government website, where they will find a dedicated section for the electronic visa application. The user-friendly interface guides applicants through the form, prompting them to input essential details such as personal information, travel plans, and other pertinent details required for visa processing.
One of the advantages of the digital platform is the seamless document submission process. Applicants can upload the necessary documents electronically, eliminating the need for physical submissions. From proof of identity to travel itineraries, the online system ensures a straightforward process, reducing both time and effort for applicants.
A notable feature of the online visa system is the expedited processing time. Unlike traditional methods that may take weeks for visa approvals, the digital platform aims to provide quicker turnarounds. This is particularly beneficial for travelers with imminent plans, ensuring they receive their New Zealand visas promptly and without unnecessary delays.
The introduction of the online visa system symbolizes New Zealand‚Äôs commitment to fostering global collaborations and deepening friendships with nations worldwide. By making the visa application process more accessible, New Zealand aims to encourage travel, promote tourism, and build bridges between nations. This initiative highlights New Zealand‚Äôs dedication to embracing technological advancements for the betterment of travel experiences.
The introduction of the online visa application system marks a new era for New Zealand‚Äôs visa procedures. With a focus on accessibility, efficiency, and transparency, the digital platform is poised to redefine the way citizens from Belgium, France, Germany, the United Kingdom, and Argentina embark on their journeys to New Zealand. This strategic move not only aligns with the global shift towards digitalization but also underscores New Zealand‚Äôs commitment to providing an unparalleled travel experience for visitors from around the world. As these nations and their citizens embrace the effortless online visa application process, New Zealand eagerly awaits to showcase its wonders and extend a warm Kiwi welcome to all.

author: R√°dio Renascen√ßa
title: Universidade do Algarve alvo de ciberataque com acesso a dados pessoais - Renascen√ßa
text: 22 nov, 2024 - 14:15 ‚Ä¢ Lusa A Universidade do Algarve (UAlg) foi alvo de um ciberataque, no qual foram extra√≠dos dados pessoais de candidatos, estudantes e funcion√°rios, mas o problema que n√£o interrompeu as atividades acad√©micas, informou esta sexta-feira a academia. Em comunicado, a UAlg refere que o ataque ao sistema inform√°tico de gest√£o ocorreu entre 14 e 19 de novembro, tendo a amea√ßa sido eliminada desde as 20h00 de ter√ßa-feira, ap√≥s a corre√ß√£o do sistema. "Durante o per√≠odo em que ocorreu [o ciberataque] foram exfiltrados dados pessoais de alguns membros da comunidade acad√©mica (candidatos, estudantes e funcion√°rios)", real√ßa a universidade. De acordo com a UAlg, o ciberataque "n√£o extraiu de igual forma todos os dados pessoais", nomeadamente os endere√ßos de correio eletr√≥nico, contactos telef√≥nicos, nomes e n√∫meros de identifica√ß√£o banc√°rios (IBAN). Na nota, a academia indica que alertou as pessoas afetadas sobre as medidas necess√°rias que devem ser tomadas para se protegerem, cumprindo com as obriga√ß√µes do Regulamento Geral de Prote√ß√£o de Dados. Ainda segundo a universidade algarvia, "nunca as atividades regulares foram interrompidas, nomeadamente as letivas e de investiga√ß√£o". O ciberataque foi reportado √†s autoridades policiais e ao Centro Nacional de Ciberseguran√ßa (CNCS), Comiss√£o de Prote√ß√£o de Dados (CNPD). A Universidade do Algarve lamenta o ocorrido e "os poss√≠veis inconvenientes que do mesmo possam advir" para os visados, assegurando que mant√©m o compromisso de manter o maior n√≠vel de seguran√ßa da informa√ß√£o dos membros da comunidade acad√©mica.
